text: Raul Cano Pangalangan (born September 1, 1958) is a Filipino lawyer, and currently, a judge of the International Criminal Court. A graduate of Political Science and Law from the University of the Philippines, Pangalangan received his Law master's degree (1986) and doctorate (1990) from Harvard Law School. He became the dean of the University of the Philippines College of Law at UP Diliman from 1995 to 2005 and was the publisher of the Philippine Daily Inquirer. Pangalangan was elected as a judge of the ICC on June 24, 2015. He was sworn in as a judge on July 13, 2015 and is set to serve in the position until March 10, 2021. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:International Criminal Court judges Category:University of the Philippines Diliman alumni Category:Harvard Law School alumni Category:University of the Philippines faculty Category:University of the Philippines College of Law alumni Category:20th-century Filipino lawyers Category:21st-century lawyers Category:Filipino judges Category:Filipino newspaper publishers (people) Category:Philippine Daily Inquirer people Category:Filipino judges of international courts and tribunals
title: Raul Pangalangan
